title: XKCD
description: A webcomic of romance, sarcasm, math, and language.

panels.alt_text:
[[A boy sits in a barrel which is floating in an ocean.]]
Boy: I wonder where I'll float next?
[[The barrel drifts into the distance. Nothing else can be seen.]]

pages.title: Petit Trees (sketch)
pages.title_text: 'Petit' being a reference to Le Petit Prince, which I only thought about halfway through the sketch

panels.alt_text: [[Two trees are growing on opposite sides of a sphere.]]
